thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Arbutus Settles Litigation Terminating Acuitas Rights To LNP Technology

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Arbutus Settles Litigation Terminating Acuitas Rights To LNP Technology
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Arbutus Biopharma Corp:
* ARBUTUS SETTLES LITIGATION, TERMINATING ACUITAS’ RIGHTS TO LNP TECHNOLOGY
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA CORP - ‍SETTLEMENT TERMINATES ACUITAS’ RIGHT TO USE OR SUBLICENSE OUR LNP TECHNOLOGY GOING FORWARD​
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA - ‍SETTLEMENT STIPULATES THAT 4 NON-EXCLUSIVE VIRAL VACCINE SUBLICENSES PREVIOUSLY GRANTED TO MODERNA ARE ONLY SUBLICENSES TO SURVIVE​
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA - LITIGATION INITIATED BY ACUITAS THERAPEUTICS ON OCT. 25, 2016 IN SUPREME COURT OF BRITISH COLUMBIA HAS BEEN SETTLED BEFORE TRIAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
